title: App won't let me login or send a bug report on it.
body:
I have restored my phone to factory settings, reinstalled the app and still can't use it anymore.
It won't let me log in, freezing at half loaded morgana and ahri picture.  (link)
I use android 5.1, and i tried installing earlier versions of League Friends, but seems like this bug has something to do with web content loading up at log in page but not the app itself.  
I can't even press the "settings" button to report the bug since it immediately goes to this picture with ahri and morgana with a brief "initialization"  text before it. 
Please help, i want to use this app again.
I've sent a ticket to support, but they sent me here.

replies.body:
Hey Bardie!
We released a fix yesterday that should help alleviate this problem. If you could reopen the app (you don't need to update or anything) and try again it will hopefully be working. If you're still seeing issues please let us know (and also if you include as much information about what device you're running on it would be great!)
